lender.name: Stefanie
lender.loan_because: It important to give back.

lender.name: Araceli
lender.loan_because: I believe in a "push-up" vs. a "hand-out". Those requesting loans are trying to help themselves and their families by WORKING.

lender.name: Tom
lender.occupation: Glass bead maker and world gadfly
lender.loan_because: I like to share my good fortune, make the world a safer place, see smiles smitten
lender.occupational_info: When I'm not making glass bead jewelry, I'm working to promote interfaith dialogue. I think that can make the world a more peaceful place.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: God has been so kind to me and my family and I want to help someone else in need.
lender.occupational_info: I run a furniture store in a small town in the midwest . we sell all types of home furnishings .

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are not as fortunate to have the opportunities that we have here in the USA. I think if we give a little no matter how small, It will one day make a difference and help make it a better world to live in. And maybe some day unite and have world peace.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I desperately need to build an addition to my house for my three children. Please help.
lender.occupational_info: mom

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to touch people all around the world and to have a positive impact in someone's life. It is a true privilege for me to assist someone who has the desire and passion to work hard to better their own life.
lender.occupational_info: Management training and development.

lender.name: Kelli Pedersen
lender.loan_because: it's a small amount (dinner out for our family) but can completely change another persons life. Also, it is such a lift when someone pays off their loan and you know they were able to reach their goal!
lender.occupational_info: I cut and design vinyl lettering and sayings for walls, window decals and banners. I am also trying to start "Kelz Hot Dogz" where I will work lunch hours, tournaments and festivals.

lender.name: Vladik
lender.loan_because: its necessary.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a small difference in the world.

lender.name: Tamica
lender.loan_because: The Lord blesses me continually so it is my desire to be a blessing to someone else.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I like helping people. I do not have much money, but I like to help others who are worse off than I am.
lender.occupational_info: I answer and handle telephone calls from customers who are having problems with their telephone service.

lender.name: Maryellen
lender.loan_because: I hope to help other women so they inturn can help themselves and others.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my two children. my husband has a job outside the home.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference even if it is a small one which can help one more person. I want to pass it on!
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student going for my elementary education degree so that I can teach young children.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.occupation: former Biotech Co National Sales Mgr
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate enough to be educated and able to contribute to the support of my family, communities, and country. This is a way to give back worldwide and help other people who are trying to achieve the same goals.
lender.occupational_info: I was responsible for the sale of hospital and medical research supplies to scientists in the US who were doing research on the human body and trying to discover new drugs and treatments for patients.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I can identify with the people requesting loans. I don't have much money to give away and I really like the loan idea. Helping people help themselves is a great way to do my part in my own small way.
lender.occupational_info: I don't have a job at the moment. I'm taking a writing course and spend much of my time training my dogs (I have 8 of them!) My husband is a carpenter and is very active in his Alcoholics Anonymous group.

lender.name: Carol M.
lender.loan_because: All people deserve an opportunity to make an honest living and should be rewarded for their hard work. Eccl 4:9,10

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I dont have much money myself, and I know what it is like to work hard. I am currently a student, a single mom and I also work part time. I am now having my third child and was recently diagnosed with a terminal heart condition. When you give to others, it always is given back to you, maybe not in the same form, it might just be in happiness, however, you have nothing in live of any value if you do not have love and happiness.

lender.name: www.creditfast.com
lender.loan_because: With the help of Kiva, our goal is to help people live their dreams and provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: Credit Fast is a credit card application website. Join our Kiva team, Team CreditFast.com and help deserving people all over the world get credit. http://www.kiva.org/community/viewTeam?team_id=2275

lender.name: Lenita
lender.loan_because: It is very fulfilling to help pull someone from poverty, see someone's dream come true, and to also know that my loan helped make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Maliwan
lender.loan_because: I loan because I feel it is very important to give back and to help those in need. I know how important it is for someone to believe in you and what a difference that can make in a personâ€™s life. Each small business loan given out by kiva.org is a piece of hope and relief for the recipient - a chance for them to know they have a support system that wants them to succeed whether it be from across an ocean or right next door. Having the opportunity to give is one of the best gifts in the world.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I have visited Africa twice to help build a school for AIDS orphans - I have seen first hand what each persons donation large or small can do to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom to 3 boys - 23, 21, and 18. I believe that you teach a child by example. I want them to know the importance of giving back.

lender.name: Jillian
lender.loan_because: People need to be able to help themselves. The world makes it difficult. I understand the cost of starting a business, and the work involved. I especially feel for anyone trying to do this as well as raise a family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom of 2, and sort of run a soap making business. I make soap and lotion in my home.

lender.name: ANN
lender.occupational_info: RN

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.occupation: loves eating at restaurants with homemade foods

lender.name: jesse and silvia
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change that you want to see in the world"

lender.name: Irena RÅ«ta
lender.loan_because: it makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: When people need to talk but cannot communicate due to the language barrier, I serve as a faithful echo and make the conversation happen.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: Like those I am lending to, I am also an entrepreneur working to support a family. My children are healthy and well-cared for, and I want to share the wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to exercise properly and safely, both to improve athletic performance, and to improve overall health and fitness.

lender.name: Ozlem
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life who is trying to improve their quality of life. I feel blessed to have all that I have in my life and I want to give back to those who are less fortunate than myself. I liked the idea of Kiva since it enables entrepreuners to take the loan to expand their business without the money being used solely as charity.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company in the information technology department. Basically, I manage the applications that support our marketing organization.

lender.name: Marty and Bill
lender.loan_because: in the words of George Eliot, "What do we live for if not to make life less difficult for each other?"

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: God wants us to help each other.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help someone who is willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain high pressure boilers and the operation of sky scrapper type buildings in Chicago.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: If we are fortunate in this life and this world, we have an obligation to support others as we are able.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct psychological risk evaluations on students who have safe school violations. For example, weapons at school or drug use.

lender.name: PAUL KOBINA
lender.loan_because: how do i apply for a loan?
lender.occupational_info: care for orphanage,street children disables etc

lender.name: Rosa
lender.loan_because: I would like each dollar I loan to stretch and help more people help themselves.

lender.name: Marisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people who has faith that they can do it, because I am also business women.
lender.occupational_info: My work is taking care of the customer by doing their clothes I am in dry cleans business.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: After having been afforded the opportunity to experience the generosity and goodwill of honest people around the world, I would like to return their gestures of kindness.
lender.occupational_info: I am a helicopter pilot.

lender.name: brenda
lender.loan_because: GOD HAS TRULY BLESSED ME AND I GIVE FROM MY HEART.
lender.occupational_info: CUSTOMER SERVICE AND I LOVE PEOPLE . I TRIED TO MAKE ALL CLIENTS TO THE SPA FEEL GOOD, COMFORTABLE AND RELAXED AND ENSURE THEY ENJOY THEIR SERVICES.

lender.name: peter
lender.whereabouts: newcastle upon tyne Tyne and Wear
lender.loan_because: i feel that everyone deserves a chance too help themselves
lender.occupational_info: i work on an oil rig in the north sea

lender.name: Stefanie
lender.loan_because: I travel the world constantly being a travel expert and journalist. I find in many occasions, that I want to do more to help the locals, than just with my writings about their locations, and often find I am limited by my own resources. Kiva gives me the oppertunity to reach out and share in my life's good fortune, by lending a hand to people with adventurous entrepreneurial spirits.
lender.occupational_info: I am known as Adventure Girl. I am a travel expert who writes about travel and adventure stories for magazines and talk about travel on television shows in America.

lender.name: B A
lender.loan_because: A small amount of my money can make a huge impact on someone else's life.

lender.name: Johnny
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels to need a little money to build confidence and get ahead.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I am a senior in college studying business. I hope to own my own business one day, and would like to help others fulfill their dream.

lender.name: Analiza
lender.loan_because: i need a money in my online business as affiliiate marketer and seller of women accessories like bags, I have 5 kids and i want to help my husband
lender.occupational_info: im selling womens accessories online and a partime affilliate marketer in the internet.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the micro loan concept. Supporting small businesses improves all aspects of the community.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses that are in trouble. Their lenders bring me in so they can improve their profits and keep paying back the loans.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone needs a little help from time to time.

lender.name: william
lender.loan_because: because the borrowers have shown they deserve it by they actions of work ethics, repayment and need
lender.occupational_info: I sold Insurance to Business & Individual & made myself available to them daily for advise & coverage

lender.name: DIANE,ROB,MATT,JORDAN
lender.loan_because: To be able to give is the greatest gift, and my children are learning to share hope and dreams

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I beleive we are put on this planet to help one another. Also, I feel particularly connected to women and children around the world, and want to provide support in any way I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with "at-risk" high school aged kids. I aim to support and empower them to improve their lives and achieve happiness and stability.

lender.name: Joseph Taggart
lender.loan_because: I've been helped through rough times - now I want to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I study law and public administration at the University of Utah

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a small difference in the world. My funds are limited, but if I can make a difference with $25 dollars, then I will do it!
lender.occupational_info: I help customers obtain mortgage loans to purchase their homes.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I am a female small business owner and know how hard it is to get something going in the United States. I can't imagine how hard it is in third world countries.
lender.occupational_info: I help people organize to protect their rights, homes and quality of life.

lender.name: Minori
lender.loan_because: it gives me so much joy to be able to give someone a chance to improve their business and hopefully their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I am working on a Master's degree in Comparative and International Education at Oxford.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I saw the segment of the Oprah Show and was curious. I think this is a great website!!! To not only "give" but to be in touch with the person and become friends with someone across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I handle estates and trusts administration

lender.name: Alaynelynn
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to live where I live. To have a family who is near me and who loves me. I have faith in humankind.
lender.occupational_info: I obtain prices for big construction project in a City that has only older adults (seniors citizens ages 55 and older) 18,000 of them!

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: God has blessed our family and I want to pass that on!
lender.occupational_info: I take photos and make custom handmade notecards with them.

lender.name: Francois
lender.loan_because: Demonstrated efficiency
lender.occupational_info: Help people change

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I often need help meeting my own bills and expenses, and many times other people have helped me out. I am delighted to be able to be on the giving end for a change.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist - which doesn't pay my bills, So I also have a job. The job is bathing dogs, and cleaning and doing whatever is necessary to help out at a dog grooming salon.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: The more self-sufficient you become, the more pride and confidence you'll have in yourself. You'll be a positive role model to others and future generations.
lender.occupational_info: I design and produce printed communications for a variety of businesses and industries.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: It gives me a chance to give back to the world that has given me so much.
lender.occupational_info: In simple terms, I find jobs for people that make a difference in their careers to enable them to earn a good living for their families.

lender.name: sherrin
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves is the key for all of us.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my children, my home and keep us all healthy and happy,

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I want to help in any way possible.
lender.occupational_info: I have a cleaning business and I also run a program working with the elderly.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Everybody at one time or another needs a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I want to see everyone self-sufficient. This is one of the best ways to give back to others.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise testing centers across the state of Arizona (USA) for the AZ Dept. of Education. We administer the GED test (high school equivalency) and when passed, people can go on to college, get a job, start a business, etc. Again, making them self-sufficient.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am a business person and I know how hard it is to make a business grow.
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals, couples, and families with their relational problems.

lender.name: Linda Jean
lender.loan_because: of the stories.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I write training programs, and I also teach English to immigrates here in the United States.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: It really works!

lender.name: Schyryl
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: As an analyst/developer, I design, create, customize and support applications that are used by business users like Portfolio Accountants, Traders and Investment Managers. Outside work, I love to spend time with my husband and two wonderful kids. As a family we love to travel and spend time with our friends. The Lord has blessed us and we hope that by lending money to entrepreneurs in need we are able to touch their lives even though they live far from us. I learned that even as low as $25 can go a long way in helping other people.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I have great respect and admiration for hardworking individuals, especially under difficult circumstances. What a wonderful way to make a difference!

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: It is a way of being "in service"

lender.name: Chris & John
lender.loan_because: Our spirits are kindred with entrepreneurs everywhere. We remember how the smallest things helped us in the beginning. We want to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I teach others about business and how business finance and taxation works.

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: Is a way to say Thank You God for all the daily blessings.
lender.occupational_info: Financial Analyst, mother, wife and student. This are a few of all the jobs I have.

lender.name: OWD
lender.loan_because: We all need someone to lean on.
lender.occupational_info: Electronics technician

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: All that I have is from the Lord God almighty, and he calls us all to share what he has given us.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a dairy farm, where we milk cows and sell the raw milk to a milk factory that produces many things like cheese, sour cream, butter, and powdered milk.

lender.name: Luxaco
lender.loan_because: I believe that you get back much more than you ever give.I think it is time we all do what we can for others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business person who has many ecommerce websites and web directories.

lender.name: Towanda
lender.loan_because: I feel this is one of the best programs I have ever seen. It is great to see that the money I loan is going directly to the cause.

lender.name: Judi
lender.loan_because: We can all make a change one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a Registered Nurse for the past 37 years.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build voice, data, video, and control networks for the construction industry.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: We were always taught to help someone less fortunate than ourselves and this is a great way of doing that.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired substitute teacher. I also have taught cooking courses and cooked in restuarants.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I've always wondered how I can make a difference to people in such a far away place from me. I am pleased to know that I can help directly.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people within an exercise system called Pilates. I hope that what I do with them helps them feel good about their bodies and being physical.

lender.name: Sawyer
lender.loan_because:
My mom takes really good care of me, and handles all my finances. She knows that I want babies all over the world to have the best chace and the way to do that is to make sure their mommies have some money.
I hope that the money my mommy gives will help other mothers take control of their lives and give their children a good and promising future.
Go Mommies!
lender.occupational_info: I spend all day playing, eating and generally making a mess.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help someone get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: I do research about life in 18th century America for a museum/historic house.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: I can help others in a non-invasive, constructive manner.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites for a law firm.

lender.name: Mollie & Hannah
lender.loan_because: we want to help people.

lender.name: Rocky
lender.loan_because: Love

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: Even in this small way, I can make a big difference in someones life, and do so without a hand out. So much better for someones self respect.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: There is no one I respect more than the entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: Complex litigation.

lender.name: theresa
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that are helping themselves make a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am self employed and help people buy houses by helping them get a loan from the bank.

lender.name: M
lender.loan_because: I may not have a lot, but I'm better off then others. Sometimes you need to lend a hand to pull another up onto their feet.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a server and I enjoy my work.I plan to go back to college soon.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: my parents were small business people and my mom would be happy, that I can in a small way pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: I go to peoples homes when the are sick and injuried and help them and then take them to the hospital

lender.name: Gilbert
lender.loan_because: I believe that each person can make a difference in the world we live in. We a so lucky and we don't even know it. It's time to give that luck to somebody else.
lender.occupational_info: Well, I've been raised in a restaurant. It was obvious for me that I wanted to continue in that branch. I'm a waiter and I love being in contact with the public.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: "Hands that help are holier than lips that pray." - Sai Baba

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference every way that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the man.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: The money goes directly to the people that need it.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: It gives me great pleasure to be able to help someone who needs and is deserving of my help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired Nurse

lender.name: Treva
lender.occupation: Rescue Fire Protection / CPR / EMT/ Specialist

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I can't change the whole world at once but this offers a bite size way to start.
lender.occupational_info: I can't quit my day job but I like to paint.

lender.name: Delores
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to support our worldwide community.

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: I believe that Kiva is a reputable organization that can see the money gets where it will do the most good.
lender.occupational_info: Most would understand what a teacher is. Though that part of my life is now finished I still do some freelance work with a foundation that supports nutrition programs for school children.

lender.name: heather
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to keep in touch and stay together globally
lender.occupational_info: I am a Public Helth Student attending university

lender.name: Kim Stueck
lender.loan_because: I feel that everyone should have the means to be self-sufficient. With just a little help, that can happen for many people.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: because I want to
lender.occupational_info: I am in 4th grade.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: It's renewable!

lender.name: Fauve
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time Architecture Student at Loyalist College in Canada

lender.name: tom
lender.loan_because: I would like to see someone suceed and have a better life and help there family , I know if they were in my shoe they would do the same !!!
lender.occupational_info: I take information from clients that wanna buy a home or a commercial property and see if they would fit the lenders guildlines to lend out money to them and money back to repay the loan note back.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: I know the struggles of being an entrepreneur. Also, God has blessed me, so I am commissioned by him to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the women's clothing business.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to live in the U.S. The money I loan is relatively insignificant to me, but has the ability to change the lives of those I loan it to.
lender.occupational_info: Mama of two boys.

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: I have visited and volunteered in many of the areas in need of loans and want to continue to help when I'm not physically there.
lender.occupational_info: I work in corporate marketing for an on-demand software company

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard working people that deserve a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that distributes drugs to customers when they need it. I help my company find ways to improve the process and help the customers.

lender.name: andrea
lender.loan_because: i am called to help others!

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: because we all need to live together in this world

lender.name: Candice
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a valuable vehicle by which I can help others who "have a plan to help themselves". It's just so painful to think of parents not being able to provide life's basic needs for their children. Why shouldn't I help others who have never had the opportunities that I have had all my life. I've had to get through difficult times, but nothing in comparison to the obsticles that some of these people have to overcome on a daily basis, just to exist.

lender.name: Rajan
lender.loan_because: What we do for ourselves dies with us. What we do for others and the world remains and is immortal.
lender.occupational_info: Property letting. Providing comfortable accommodation for students and working professionals in UK.

lender.name: Alana
lender.loan_because: it's good to finally be able to help other people!

lender.name: Dolores & Curtis
lender.loan_because: I care about people and would love to see other people doing the same thing

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: Providing capital to small businesses is a direct way to enhance the lives of people around the world and build a truly global economy
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to help them develop plans to improve their financial success, and I invest money in those companies to help them grow.

lender.name: Captain EyePatch
lender.loan_because: I be a pirate with a heart of gold... but if anyone let's that out, I be comin' ta' gut ye like a fish! Aye, so says I!!!
lender.occupational_info: Plyin' the stormy seas with nay, nuthin' but me heart's compass to guide me through Neptune's wrathful obstacles... arrrrrrrr, but me cutlass is sharp & me hook even keener!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's sooo fun! And also because I'm a little bit addicted to this site now...
lender.occupational_info: Completing graduate work in social psychology at the University of Calgary, in Calgary, Alberta.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I am able to. I have learned that "you can only keep what you have by giving it away" (or in this case, loaning it).
lender.occupational_info: I assist departments within hospitals to increase their efficiency while reducing risk.

lender.name: Joost
lender.loan_because: I hope I am helping people around the world taking control over their lives
lender.occupational_info: Owner of a consultancy company in renewable energy

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I believe in the inherent good that is in people and that resourcefulness coupled with kindness can make a big difference,

lender.name: NFernandez
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired by people's hard work and aspirations. I want to help other people.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: it's an easy way to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Worked in high tech for 19 years.

lender.name: Minelly
lender.loan_because: its good to care about others
lender.occupational_info: special eduation/middle school teacher :) mostly science

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: ...it is the RIGHT thing to do. Being able to support and see someone follow a dream to create a better life...well, that is pretty cool. This is a great way to connect to our "global family."
lender.occupational_info: I'm very lucky to be able to stay at home with my son.

lender.name: Two Wolves
lender.loan_because: I believe that even the smallest contribution is inspiration!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large store where my main focus is customer service.

lender.name: Andrew's family
lender.loan_because: If not me, who? If not now, when? Everyone deserves to be believed in!!
lender.occupational_info: I am the vice president of a company that provide services to handicapped people. I also coach wrestling, football, and baseball.

lender.name: Rapid Tag & Label
lender.loan_because: We loan because it is an inexpensive way to make a difference and help others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We make all types of clothing labels. Like woven labels, printed labels and hangtags.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I currently stay home and take care of my son.

lender.name: Father Gerald Mullally
lender.loan_because: "The one who does not love his brother whom he has seen,cannot love God whom he has not seen."
lender.occupational_info: Church pastor

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I want to help those, as I have been truly blessed!
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I sell and buy homes for a living where we live!

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I care that people get the chance to do something they love.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find their dream home.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to meet their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full-time student at New York University in New York CIty, studying history, law, and social justice. I will also be working part-time in a New York City school as a classroom aide.

lender.name: Geri & Nicole, Bruce
lender.loan_because: I have learned as a single parent the struggles that come along with providing for your children. To help someone provide for themselves and their family is the best way of saying "It can and will be better"
lender.occupational_info: I buy raw land and get it through the government systems then sell to a builder for the purpose of new homes

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I believe people are the best architects of their destinies when they have opportunity and that opportunity should not be determined by the randomness of a person's birthplace. I like to help women in particular as a form of gratitude for the blessings I've been granted in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I make sweets in all variety for restaurants.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: i want to help
lender.occupational_info: I work with a computer to create websites for companies.

lender.name: Gigi
lender.loan_because: Karma!
lender.occupational_info: I am part of a team that manages a computer network for a hospital and several clinics.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: I have traveled extensively around the world, experienced the inante goodness in people everywhere, and want to help however I can...
lender.occupational_info: Event producer

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: When you give you get. I want to keep the blessings going in my life. A closed fist doesn't let anything out, nor does it let anything in.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: In order to keep it I must give it away
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Canadian, but I own a home in Costa Rica . My partner and I now live in Costa Rica for most of the year. She is also a retired Canadian

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I bolive the every one needs the tool's to go forward in life.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: It's the next best thing to actually going to developing countries and volunteering.

lender.name: Rusty from Alaska
lender.loan_because: I want to make a change in someone else's life. I am an Alaskan Eskimo and I take my lead from my mother when it comes to building a community.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I work in the hospitality industry but in the past, my work in Alaska was IT support to some of the top world-wide companies. Soon, changes will be coming, I hope you are part of it.

lender.name: Samantha Selvais
lender.occupational_info: translator/technical writer

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I know that there are people who will always need help more than I ever will.
lender.occupational_info: None now. In America, if you are determined,but not really educated that much, when you reach an older age {59} sometimes you are replaced with some one younger. In Michigan, you can be laid off just because ! It is called an "at will" state. The employer does not need a reason.

lender.name: Alonzo
lender.loan_because:
I want to sow into people who believe in working for themsleves.
Proverbs 19:17 He that hath pity upon the poor lendeth unto the LORD; and that which he hath given will he pay him again.
Deuteronmy 28:12 The LORD shall open unto thee his good treasure, the heaven to give the rain unto thy land in his season, and to bless all the work of thine hand: and thou shalt lend unto many nations, and thou shalt not borrow.

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: It's such an easy and smart way to help people in an empowering way.

lender.name: Vu~
lender.loan_because: trying to slide underneath the pearly gates.
lender.occupational_info: scientist developing a malaria vaccine

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I am all for helping someone who wants to help themselves make a better life. The money is not important, but the livelihood is. I have taught my children that ANYTHING is possible, and we can all use some help to attain our dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I think they already know what it is to be a mother or a health care worker... I am a nurturer and a daughter of God, and my purpose is to do the right thing, and I mean that in all humility.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to help others stand on their own. I can't afford to give large amounts but in this way I still feel that I can help someone accomplish their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I work from home and type medical reports from doctor's dictations, for hospitals and doctor's offices, that is done over the Internet.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: if every one of us just helped out other people, no matter their race, color, beliefs, or lifestyle the world could become a much happier, decent place and maybe we could all learn to live together instead of destroying each other and our environment.
lender.occupational_info: I design makeup for theatrical shows, art pieces, etc.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It's fun and I want to empower women.

lender.name: laurie
lender.loan_because: I have had a chance, now it is time for someone else's chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from my career, but now am raising my young niece. My work is that of a parent.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: God has given me the gifts to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals that have different disabilities. I live with them full time and am trying to teach them how to live independently. It is a very challenging job, but also very rewarding!

lender.name: Mitchell
lender.loan_because: I can. In the film business you spent half your time, simply wondering where the money's going to come from.....and that's just to make a movie. No one should have to wonder where the money will come from to feed a their family or to have a roof over their heads.
lender.occupational_info:
I am writer and that's my first love in the industry. I still read and critique a lot of scripts but lately, I find myself in the role of Producer a lot more and I enjoy the give and take with other film makers. Being even a small part of seeing to it that someone's project comes together is a pretty rewarding place to be in.
speersml@hotmail.com
http://profile.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=user.viewprofile&friendid=61916986

lender.name: andi
lender.loan_because: â€œHe who is kind to the poor lends to the LORD, and he will reward him for what he has done.â€ Proverbs 19:17

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much that I should give in return.
lender.occupational_info: I am in my last year of medical school, training to care for children and adults.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should be given a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help our employees when they get ready to retire and what they are entitled to as far as benefits and an annuity.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I respect and admire people who attempt to start their own business, especially in the most difficult of circumstances. It is very hard work and so very risky. I feel connected to my lendees and pray for their success. And I'm deeply moved every time I receive an email alerting me that another payment has been made. It gives me hope for them and for the world.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small business making jewelry from sea glass. Sea Glass is the bits of polished glass that can be found along the shores of lakes and oceans that comes from discarded glass items that have been tossed into the sea. The glass is pounded by the waves and polished by the sand until it is a beautifully, smooth, "semi-precious" stone.

lender.name: Jacquelynn
lender.loan_because: Unlike charitable aid, these microloans actually make a difference for the struggling local economies in which they are given. Just a few dollars from my pocket can make the difference not only for the one person who receives the loan, but ultimately for his family, his neighbors and his country.
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop webpages and training materials about technological topics for a university.

lender.name: Kwabena
lender.loan_because: To help with the most challenging issue of our society "World Poverty". Power of Micro-financing.
lender.occupational_info: Janitor

lender.name: Leila
lender.loan_because: I believe that we can change the world and provide for a better future. I have had a heart for Africa almost my entire life..I'm not even sure why. My dream is to one day move to Africa and work in health care as a nurse practitioner.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital diagnosing and treating illness. I help make sick people well through medicine and other treatments. I am also completing my clinical doctorate so that I have even more knowledge to offer my patients.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I am blessed enough so that I can.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels to want to start a business but not have the money to do it. I want someone else to have the wonderful feeling of owning something that they are proud of and doing what they love to do.
lender.occupational_info: Children's clothing and gift sales.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: too little is done for the small businesses around this world. They are often overlooked and under appreciated, though they are what drive communities and impact individuals everyday. I want to help in every way I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an engineer, trying to make medical advancements possible. In my spare time I mentor elementary school children in math and science.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of someone's life who is far away. I've grown up in middle class America, where, on the outside, no one struggles finacially. I want to give someone else that chance of fiscal stability that I have enjoyed for most of my life. I will help my brothers and sisters, all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who is going to go to medical school and hopefully be a doctor to the world through organizations like Partners In Health or Doctors Without Borders.

lender.name: Carmen
lender.occupational_info: Fun!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: "In every community there is work to be done. In every nation there are wounds to heal. In every heart, there is power to do it." -Marianne Williamson
lender.occupational_info: I am a dental hygienist and I am hoping to be in dental school within the next few years.

lender.name: Equipment Controls Co.
lender.loan_because: Everyone that has the desire and is willing to put forth the effort to succeed, earns the opportunity to reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Our company distributes measurement and control products for natural gas thoughout the United States and Mexico.

lender.name: Paulett
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help someone realize their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I am a community activist/volunteer working primarily to help children with problems in reading, health, appreciation of music and the arts.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of all people. If given the chance, they will do the right thing.
lender.occupational_info: Help poor urban students attend college

lender.name: Lila
lender.occupation: Crisis Center for Mothers with Children
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an awesome vehicle to help people from all over the world help themselves! People who I would otherwise never have the opportunity to assist!
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom who has the time to volunteer and I operate a center for homeless mothers and their children who are seeking self-sufficiency

lender.name: janice
lender.loan_because: It is better to give to all of GODS children..
lender.occupational_info: I worked for car company, bulding heavy dudy trucks.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are working toward economic independence for themselves and their families. Through KIVA I can help people no matter where they live in the World. What a great feeling!
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Special Needs teacher. Now I spend a lot of my time taking care of my four grandsons, ages 7, 9, 11 and 14.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: Because I (just by luck) was fortunate enought to be born to a loving/monetarily stable family in the United States.

lender.name: Alberto
lender.loan_because: Years ago I had a dream, so I asked my Dad for help and a little bit of magic to change my life. Today; I have what I asked for it. Now is my turn to give it back to those in need. (My dad died 30 + yrs ago, and I'm still asking for his magic)
lender.occupational_info: I support different programs within my company.

lender.name: Candee
lender.loan_because: When we are blessed with bounty, it is only right to share and help those in need,
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a short-term psychiatric hospital for children under 18.

lender.name: Shankar
lender.loan_because: I always wanted to help poor people who are need of help.This gives me happiness and a peaceful sleep.To see a happy face gives me more happiness and satisfaction.

lender.name: Ismail Charania
lender.loan_because: I like the way loan applicant pays back.
lender.occupational_info: I would give something back to the people of third world, as a I belong to one.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: Even the smallest thing can change a life and ripple out to others. I want to make that difference because so many have done so much for me in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I have retired from paid work. I now volunteer at a domestic violence agency, a Massachusetts conservation program and at a program caring for children in Romania.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: what goes around comes around. Pass it forward.

lender.name: Carlee
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone make a better life for themselves. We all need help sometime in our life, that is why God gave us each other.
lender.occupational_info: I help, encourage, and support my husband and am dedicated to raising my children in a way that honors the Lord.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: someday I may need to ask for assistance
lender.occupational_info: for my living, I qualitiy check computer monitoring software; for myself, I create metal jewelry and objects

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: Because being a single mother there are alot of hardships but I do understand that by giving God rewards and blesses the little you have.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful oppertunity to help others attain a better life.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: Loaning through KIVA is like planting seeds all over the world. By coming together to make loans we become like a forest rather than an individual tree.
lender.occupational_info: Taught mentally retared children. Now retired, enjoy travel, long walks, reading, fishing, meeting new people, finding ways to help others.

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: someone else needs my $25 more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I like to try to make things look nice, whether it's a brochure, a website or a canvas.

lender.name: Tonya
lender.loan_because: I want to be a blessing to others outside of the US.
lender.occupational_info: I teach computers and business to 14-18 year old students.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women in foreign countries become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Just lending a helping hand to other women.

lender.name: Marie, James & Allie
lender.loan_because: We love helping people improve their own lives through owning their own business
lender.occupational_info: Marie helps people save for their retirement and James is a manager for a retail hardware store. Allie is a high school student

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: it is a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: rehabilitation nursing for spinal cord injured people.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic idea. What a great way to help others. Everyone should do this!
lender.occupational_info: I oversee a platoon of security officers servicing our Municipal Social Housing communities

lender.name: Gayle
lender.loan_because: These folks deserve a hand up& I am grateful to be able to help them get there [I once struggled too!]. Its the right thing to do..bless them all!
lender.occupational_info: My proudest achievement is raising my 2 wonderful children into compassionate,honest & productive adults.I live with my husband& many rescued dogs&cats.I enjoy reading,cooking,knitting&crafts,&make money with occasional translations.

lender.name: WAYNE
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me & my family and I feel it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I had to take early retirement due to illness

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: You need it and you are worthy. I believe it to be my responsibility to help others in their time of need. If I was not helped, I would not be able to return the favor now.
lender.occupational_info: I help people cover the risks they face and help them plan for their future.

lender.name: Colin, MIchelle, and Cole
lender.occupation: parents teaching a child the importance of giving

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help someone else and Kiva is a great organization!

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I feel that even though I cant do much, by helping one person it can make a difference for them and for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a representitive for a ski apparel company, I deal with retail shops directly to distribute our clothing line and help teach the sales associates about the products.

lender.name: Delores
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and enjoy helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people pay their traditional home mortgage in 1/2 the time or less with a special software package I sell.

lender.name: Cindi
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my own life.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: We all should be of service to each other. It warms my heart to help those in need. Especially those who are trying so hard and just need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a Fine Art - Documentary Photographer for 28 yrs. I have been an Entreprenur as well since 1993

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: People have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Renaissance literature

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I like knowing that my money is being put to good use, and that the entrepreneurs' lives who receive these loans are bettered by it. I think it is cool how they don't just receive money, which takes no effort on their part, but they are simply given a starting hand; it is up to them where to go with it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: It's a privilege to share, and it's exciting to help a business grow!
lender.occupational_info: I assist faculty members with academic leaves and with travel grants to present their research at conferences.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to help - you never lose! and so much is gained.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find information on anything they need--finding jobs, finding recreational reading, finding names for their babies, and much much more.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good. We are here to help others. These gifts make an impact on someone's life. Pay it forward!!
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in the Financial Services industry

lender.name: Gilbert
lender.loan_because: I believe in this idea.
lender.occupational_info: Engage in SAP utility industry projects

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I know how hard you have to work to survive. I don't have much, no one has ever helped me, but I want to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: My sewing is my life. I make very well made, affordable doll clothes, each a one of a kind.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I believe in the helping spirit of women, who willingly lend a hand, heart, or whatever is needed to their sisters, wherever they might live across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from the mental health profession. In private practice for over 25 years, I treated individuals, couples, and families, hoping to guide them to happier and more productive paths in their relationships and in their lives in general.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I hope I can share some wealth with deserving people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Autistic children and help them learn to live somewhat independently in this world.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I am a citizen of the world and do what I can to help make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: Working in the Arts..producing art shows, promoting artists.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: This is in memory of the most wonderful dad in the world. I love you and miss you.

lender.name: Vivian
lender.loan_because: I respect hard work and it makes me happy to give someone an opportunity to help themselves, their family and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office and provide assistance to employees of my company who have questions about their benefits.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: It is a blessing to sow seeds.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: it is a wonderful opportunity to help someone help themselves, and it is incredibly affordable. I love the feeling I could help!
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to be retired and I entertain myself watching my grandchildren and reading and doing needlework.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the operations of a preschool. I am fortunate to have the opportunity to make a difference in the lives of young children every day.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: we all deserve a chance to better ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with disabilities find work. And at night I work in a coffee shop.

lender.name: Nick & Monik
lender.loan_because: if you can help someone, why not do it?
lender.occupational_info: We are French Canadians,Nick is a College Professor.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it's fun.
lender.occupational_info: i am studying to become a doctor.
